column4: can anyone help me get totem-xine to work properly instead of using totem-gstreamer for playing DVDs? I mean I already got the Medibuntu package and installed libdvdcss plugins but I still cant play DVDs
used to work right away on Fiesty
Why not use gxine or VLC for DVDs?
Will VLC? It sounds like a xine or libdvdcss problem.
